name: International Surgeons of the Americas
tag_list: surgery-in-mexico, surgical-solutions, surgery-mexico, medical-tourism-companies, dental-work-in-mexico, surgeons-in-mexico, international-surgery, healthcare-tourism, medical-procedures-in-mexico
overview: ISA Surgical provides a portal to the international surgical practices of a select group of the most experienced and skilled surgeons in Mexico. These surgeons are at the peak of successful careers, established as leaders in their communities, and share a common desire to provide excellent surgical care at affordable prices to patients whose lives would be improved or saved through their efforts. The primary care physicians and surgical specialists who serve on ISA Surgical’s Qualification, Evaluation and Review Committee hand-pick the surgeons in the ISA Surgical network, based only on their professional excellence and statistical surgical outcomes.
